Articles.Content: Cool. Interesting method of many launches, including one for a separate crew cabin, instead of a grand mothership that drops off a lander (which is personally what I would have done)
Nice. I have yet to even land a probe on that grey lump of rock, but it gets a bit closer every career I play.
Nicely done, much more efficient than brute force, which i done, but you should just cut throttle in low speed and max throttle soon after, keep doing that till you are close to surface
